reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 552/06: APPEAL BODY FOR LOCAL LAND USE PLANNING MATTERS
reg_info.reg_name_text: APPEAL BODY FOR LOCAL LAND USE PLANNING MATTERS

content.section: Requirement for appeal body to establish rules
content.content: 1. The appeal body shall establish rules of practice and procedure to govern its proceedings, which rules shall deal with, at minimum, the matters listed in Schedule 1. O. Reg. 552/06, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The appeal body shall establish rules of practice and procedure to govern its proceedings, which rules shall deal with, at minimum, the matters listed in Schedule 1. O. Reg. 552/06, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The appeal body shall make the rules established under section 1 available to the public. O. Reg. 552/06, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The appeal body shall make the rules established under section 1 available to the public. O. Reg. 552/06, s. 2.

content.content: 3. (1) The appeal body shall produce an annual report on its operations, which shall include audited financial statements. O. Reg. 552/06, s. 3 (1). (2) The appeal body shall make the annual report available to the public. O. Reg. 552/06, s. 3 (2).
content.raw_html:
3. (1) The appeal body shall produce an annual report on its operations, which shall include audited financial statements. O. Reg. 552/06, s. 3 (1).

(2) The appeal body shall make the annual report available to the public. O. Reg. 552/06, s. 3 (2).

content.content: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 552/06, s. 4. SCHEDULE 1   MATTERS TO BE DEALT WITH IN RULES OF PRACTICE AND PROCEDURE The rules governing the practice and procedure before the appeal body shall deal with, as a minimum, the following matters: 1. Application of rules. 2. Representatives and notice to representatives. 3. Timing of proceedings. 4. How proceedings are commenced. 5. Notice. 6. Documents, exhibits, filing and service. 7. Discovery. 8. Motions and forms. 9. Settlement before hearing. 10. Compelling attendance of witnesses by summons. 11. Consolidated hearings. 12. Adjournments. 13. Mediation. 14. Pre-hearing conferences. 15. The manner in which hearings are held. 16. Quorum and panels. 17. Effect of expiry of member’s term during hearing. 18. Vacancies on appeal body. 19. Decisions and orders. O. Reg. 552/06, Sched. 1. Français
content.raw_html:
4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 552/06, s. 4.

SCHEDULE 1
MATTERS TO BE DEALT WITH IN RULES OF PRACTICE AND PROCEDURE

The rules governing the practice and procedure before the appeal body shall deal with, as a minimum, the following matters:

1. Application of rules.

2. Representatives and notice to representatives.

3. Timing of proceedings.

4. How proceedings are commenced.

5. Notice.

6. Documents, exhibits, filing and service.

7. Discovery.

8. Motions and forms.

9. Settlement before hearing.

10. Compelling attendance of witnesses by summons.

11. Consolidated hearings.

12. Adjournments.

13. Mediation.

14. Pre-hearing conferences.

15. The manner in which hearings are held.

16. Quorum and panels.

17. Effect of expiry of member’s term during hearing.

18. Vacancies on appeal body.

19. Decisions and orders.

O. Reg. 552/06, Sched. 1.

Français
